$interpreted: Elio: ...Mr. Nigel, the deserts are filled with wild beasts, as well as monsters. You'll be in danger if you fall behind.
Nigel: Hmph! I'm not getting too close to you lot. Who's to say whether it'll be the beasts or the humans who pounce on me first.
Elio: We've only just set off. Are you going to keep your guard up the whole way to Atlas?
Nigel: Please. Who knows when you'll show your true colors?
Nigel: Hey, who said you could sit here!?
Elio: Excuse me, but I'm concerned about you.
Nigel: What the hell! You can just tell me if you want to keep an eye on me. Theodore may have been a crook, but at least he was upfront about it.
Elio: ...Charle Ceres.
Nigel: Huh?

Elio: Theodore's not my father. I'm not a Carlos.
 My father's name was Charle Ceres.
Nigel: What are you on about now...
Elio: Perhaps you're not as familiar with me as you think, Mr. Nigel. If you don't mind... May I tell you my story?
Nigel: Who's that!? ...Oh, it's you, Izumi...
Izumi: Ah, you're awake. How unfortunate~
Nigel: Stop monkeying about. I've not seen you all evening, where have you been?
Izumi: Oh, just around~ You were having such a cosy chat with the little prince, I didn't want to disturb you~
Nigel: ...Nevermind. And stop calling him a little prince, he doesn't think of himself as a Carlos.
Izumi: Hah? But isn't he one of their family?
Nigel: I thought so too, but...
Nigel: ...Hey, Izumi, you think it's possible? For people not to care about each others' blood, their roots?
Izumi: ......
Izumi: ...Well, I guess you stop caring either way if you live long enough. Bloodlines or whatever.
Nigel: Seriously though, what do you think?
Izumi: What's got you so curious... You wanna trust them, is that it, Nigel?
Nigel: ......
Izumi: You can be straight with me~
Nigel: ...You're sharp as ever, Izumi.
Izumi: Heh, naturally~
Izumi: —You've gotten so boring, Nigel.
Nigel: What...!?
Izumi: Don't look at me like that. I wanted to go on having fun with you. But it'd be so lame if you were to join forces with them.
Izumi: In any case~ I'm lending a hand to Atlas because I'm looking forward to a fight, not some mutual love-in~
Nigel: What... what are you jabbering about now...?
Izumi: Don't believe me? Yamitsuki's a lot more observant about such things than you.
Izumi: I'd have forced you to stay back in the East if I'd known it was going to turn out this way~ What fun it'd be to see Atlas leaderless and lost, scattered to the winds~
Nigel: Get a load of you!
Nigel: You're a demihuman, too. Why would you want to drag your compatriots down?
Izumi: Compatriots? This is just a game to me—
Izumi: A game carefully planned out by the Eighth Parhelion of the Dracontines.
Nigel: Dracontines... H-how could that be... You...!?
Izumi: All right~ Enough of the hammy dialogue already.
Izumi: When Yamitsuki sees the delegation bringing back your dead corpse, the ensuing war between Atlas and the Kingdom of the Sun will be a sight to behold!
Nigel: You creep! Just how much longer are you going to go on tormenting us!
Izumi: I don't know either, it's just a game.
Izumi: I told you, if you live long enough... You stop caring about everything.
Ace: Since it's a game, how about letting us play, too?
Nigel: You...!?
Izumi: Eh? You're not asleep yet?
Ace: We're not prepared to let a single hair on our charge's head be harmed, lest we bring shame to Angelia and the Kingdom of the Sun. Thanks for your concern, though.
Elio: Are you all right, Mister Nigel?
Nigel: ...I'll live.
Izumi: How disappointing. I guess that'll be two more corpses for the pile~
Sun Soldier: Ace! You guys okay!?
Sun Soldier: Sorry for the hold-up, there's support from the Desert Army on the way as we speak!
Izumi: Oh no, I've given you time to call for back-up. Too bad it won't do you any good~
Izumi: —Who's gonna stop me and face their own annihilation? Any takers?
Sun Soldier: GYAAAAHHH!!
Elio: He's so much stronger than us...
Ace: Looks like he wasn't lying about being a Parhelion... All we can do now is fight on!
Izumi: ...Forget it, this is getting tedious.
Nigel: Izumi, what are you—
Izumi: It's just a game. Frankly... I don't care who loses~
Izumi: I'm just following whoever seems the most interesting... So, regretfully, I'll have to take my leave of you here~
Izumi: —Bye-bye, Nigel.
Sun Soldier: After him! Don't let him escape!
Ace: Let him go!
Ace: Our mission is to get to Atlas. We'll prioritize seeing to the wounded.
Ace: How is he?
Elio: I just had a look. Fortunately it's just a scratch.
Nigel: ...Relax, it's nothing your Queen will chew you out over.
Ace: Alright, then.
Nigel: ...I won't be thanking you or anything.
Elio: ...Mr. Nigel...
Nigel: Instead of useless words, you can have my permission to make use of the library.
Elio: Huh?
Nigel: I don't plan to re-evaluate you humans, but as a leader, I have to make the best use of all I've got.
Nigel: The Kingdom of the Sun better watch out. I won't hesitate to sacrifice you, if it comes to that.
Ace: ...We won't forget it.
Nigel: (...I best be moving on, too... We'll part ways here.)

Model.Text: ...Mr. Nigel, the deserts are filled with wild beasts, as well as monsters. You'll be in danger if you fall behind.
Hmph! I'm not getting too close to you lot. Who's to say whether it'll be the beasts or the humans who pounce on me first.
We've only just set off. Are you going to keep your guard up the whole way to Atlas?
Please. Who knows when you'll show your true colors?
Hey, who said you could sit here!?
Excuse me, but I'm concerned about you.
What the hell! You can just tell me if you want to keep an eye on me. Theodore may have been a crook, but at least he was upfront about it.
...Charle Ceres.
Huh?

Theodore's not my father. I'm not a Carlos.

I thought so too, but...

You can be straight with me~

Heh, naturally~
—You've gotten so boring, Nigel.

Don't look at me like that. I wanted to go on having fun with you. But it'd be so lame if you were to join forces with them.

Are you all right, Mister Nigel?
...I'll live.
How disappointing. I guess that'll be two more corpses for the pile~

Looks like he wasn't lying about being a Parhelion... All we can do now is fight on!

Alright, then.

...We won't forget it.
(...I best be moving on, too... We'll part ways here.)

Too bad it won't do you any good~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014Who's gonna stop me and face their own annihilation? Any takers?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Sun Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0055c2","IconName":"h0055c2_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"GYAAAAHHH!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_surprise_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He's so much stronger than us...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Looks like he wasn't lying about being a Parhelion... All we can do now is fight on!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Forget it, this is getting tedious.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Izumi, what are you\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's just a game. Frankly... I don't care who loses~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm just following whoever seems the most interesting... So, regretfully, I'll have to take my leave of you here~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014Bye-bye, Nigel.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Sun Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0055c2","IconName":"h0055c2_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"After him! Don't let him escape!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let him go!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Our mission is to get to Atlas. We'll prioritize seeing to the wounded.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How is he?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_serious_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I just had a look. Fortunately it's just a scratch.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Relax, it's nothing your Queen will chew you out over.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_35_003","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Alright, then.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I won't be thanking you or anything.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp2_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Mr. Nigel...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Instead of useless words, you can have my permission to make use of the library.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_surprise_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't plan to re-evaluate you humans, but as a leader, I have to make the best use of all I've got.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Kingdom of the Sun better watch out. I won't hesitate to sacrifice you, if it comes to that.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...We won't forget it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_004_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0038","IconName":"h0038s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...I best be moving on, too... We'll part ways here.)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
